verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* another \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* land, subsequent \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w one|strong="H7223"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w occurred|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* Abraham’s \w time|strong="H3117"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* Abimelech \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w Gerar|strong="H1642"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* Isaac \w and|strong="H3068"\w* said, “\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H7200"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*. \w Settle|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* land \w where|strong="H7931"\w* \w I|strong="H4714"\w* \w tell|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w Stay|strong="H1481"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* land \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* foreigner, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* lands \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w offspring|strong="H2233"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w confirm|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* father Abraham.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w descendants|strong="H2233"\w* \w as|strong="H5414"\w* \w numerous|strong="H7235"\w* \w as|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sky|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* lands, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w through|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w offspring|strong="H2233"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w be|strong="H1471"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*,

\w because|strong="H6118"\w* Abraham \w listened|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w charge|strong="H4931"\w*, \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w laws|strong="H8451"\w*.” Isaac Deceives Abimelech
\w So|strong="H3427"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w settled|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Gerar|strong="H1642"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H2896"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* wife, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* said, “\w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* sister.” \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* say, “\w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* wife,” \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* thought \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w*, “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H2896"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w account|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Rebekah|strong="H7259"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w so|strong="H6435"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H2896"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, Abimelech \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w down|strong="H8259"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w window|strong="H2474"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* surprised \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w caressing|strong="H6711"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* wife \w Rebekah|strong="H7259"\w*.

Abimelech \w sent|strong="H3327"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w and|strong="H3327"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w So|strong="H6435"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* really \w your|strong="H5921"\w* wife! \w How|strong="H3588"\w* could \w you|strong="H3588"\w* say, ‘\w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* sister’?” \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* replied, “\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* thought \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w might|strong="H6435"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w account|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*.”

“\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*?” \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* Abimelech. “\w One|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w could|strong="H4100"\w* \w easily|strong="H4592"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* wife, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w would|strong="H5971"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w brought|strong="H6213"\w* guilt \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H4191"\w* Abimelech warned \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, saying, “\w Whoever|strong="H3605"\w* harms \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w man|strong="H4191"\w* \w or|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* wife \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.” Isaac’s Prosperity

\w Now|strong="H3327"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w sowed|strong="H2232"\w* \w seed|strong="H2232"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* land, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* very \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w reaped|strong="H4672"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hundredfold|strong="H3967"\w*. \w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w him|strong="H4672"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w became|strong="H1431"\w* \w richer|strong="H1432"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w richer|strong="H1432"\w*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3966"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="H3966"\w* \w wealthy|strong="H1431"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1241"\w* owned \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w servants|strong="H5657"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w envied|strong="H7065"\w* \w him|strong="H7065"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w took|strong="H4390"\w* \w dirt|strong="H6083"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w stopped|strong="H5640"\w* \w up|strong="H5640"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wells \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father’s \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w had|strong="H6430"\w* \w dug|strong="H2658"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father Abraham.

\w Then|strong="H3588"\w* Abimelech said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, “\w Depart|strong="H3212"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5973"\w* \w much|strong="H3966"\w* \w too|strong="H4480"\w* \w powerful|strong="H6105"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3427"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w left|strong="H3427"\w* \w that|strong="H8033"\w* \w place|strong="H3427"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w Valley|strong="H5158"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Gerar|strong="H1642"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w settled|strong="H3427"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

\w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w reopened|strong="H2658"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* wells \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H6430"\w* \w been|strong="H4194"\w* \w dug|strong="H2658"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* father Abraham, \w which|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w had|strong="H6430"\w* \w stopped|strong="H5640"\w* \w up|strong="H5640"\w* \w after|strong="H3117"\w* Abraham \w died|strong="H4194"\w*. \w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w gave|strong="H7121"\w* \w these|strong="H7121"\w* wells \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w same|strong="H8034"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* father \w had|strong="H6430"\w* \w given|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5650"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*’s \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w dug|strong="H2658"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w valley|strong="H5158"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* well \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w fresh|strong="H2416"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \f + \fr 26:19 \ft Or flowing water or living water\f* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w herdsmen|strong="H7473"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w Gerar|strong="H1642"\w* \w quarreled|strong="H7378"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*’s \w herdsmen|strong="H7473"\w* \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* ours!” \w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w well|strong="H5973"\w* \w Esek|strong="H6230"\w*,\f + \fr 26:20 \ft Esek means contention.\f* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w contended|strong="H7378"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1571"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w dug|strong="H2658"\w* \w another|strong="H1571"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w* \w and|strong="H8034"\w* \w quarreled|strong="H7378"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H7121"\w* \w one|strong="H1571"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w*; \w so|strong="H7121"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w Sitnah|strong="H7856"\w*.\f + \fr 26:21 \ft Sitnah means enmity or hostility.\f*

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w moved|strong="H6275"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w dug|strong="H2658"\w* \w another|strong="H3808"\w* well, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w quarrel|strong="H7378"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w*. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w Rehoboth|strong="H7344"\w* \f + \fr 26:22 \ft Rehoboth means broad places or open spaces.\f* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w At|strong="H5921"\w* \w last|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H7337"\w* \w room|strong="H7337"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w fruitful|strong="H6509"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land.”
\w From|strong="H5927"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H5927"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* Beersheba,

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* father Abraham. \w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w descendants|strong="H2233"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w sake|strong="H5668"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* Abraham.”

\w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w an|strong="H1129"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w pitched|strong="H5186"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* tent \w there|strong="H8033"\w*. \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w dug|strong="H3738"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* well \w there|strong="H8033"\w*. Isaac’s Covenant with Abimelech

Later, Abimelech \w came|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* Isaac \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w Gerar|strong="H1642"\w*, \w with|strong="H1980"\w* Ahuzzath \w his|strong="H1980"\w* \w adviser|strong="H4828"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w Phicol|strong="H6369"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* \w commander|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w his|strong="H1980"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w*.

“\w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w have|strong="H4069"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w come|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*?” \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w asked|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*. “\w You|strong="H7971"\w* \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w*.”

“\w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w can|strong="H7200"\w* \w plainly|strong="H7200"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*,” \w they|strong="H3588"\w* replied. “\w We|strong="H3588"\w* recommend \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* oath \w between|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w make|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*
